subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Miami Coach Nick Saban met with the Dolphins’ owner, Wayne Huizenga, for 10 minutes Tuesday to discuss the offer he has received to coach the University of Alabama and to ask for another day to make a decision.
snippet: Miami Coach Nick Saban met with the Dolphins’ owner, Wayne Huizenga, for 10 minutes Tuesday to discuss the offer he has received to coach the University of Alabama and to ask for another day to make a decision.
